description:
This Boutique apartment complex, one of only 24 in the building, was designed to encapsulate the beautiful locale, focusing on Sandringham's renowned culture and the exceptional lifestyle presented to you as a local. This ethos has been incorporated into its sleek and sophisticated design. Unsurpassed luxury and privacy are embodied with two separate entry foyers, dual-lift access, security intercom system, and architecturally specified finishes.

This beauty and attention to design is continued within the apartment, which is granted an excellent sense of space due to carefully placed windows that capture the northern sun, encouraging sunlight to flood the home. Boasting two private balconies, the apartment exhibits excellent indoor-outdoor flow.

A luxurious and inherently practical kitchen stands at the heart of this beautiful dwelling. Fitted with top-of-the-line Miele appliances and an integrated fridge that seamlessly blends in with the cabinetry, the designer's impeccable taste remains throughout the apartment. The kitchen embraces the apartment's free-flowing design, leading into a dining and living area. Through the adjacent sliding door lies the balcony, a piece of modern art and a focal point with its sophisticated privacy screen.

The home's two bedrooms each overlook and have access to the second balcony to the rear of the property, ensuring each room remains bright and open. In addition, each bedroom features built-in wardrobes for easy storage solutions, adding to the sleek and streamlined elegance present throughout the home, and is serviced by a large, modern, and central bathroom with heated towel rails.

Quietly located a short walk from the bay and train station, this building stands proudly as part of the Sandringham community and remains connected to Melbourne's beating heart. Walk to established restaurants, cafes and the eclectic Sandringham yacht club for a drink at sunset. Be immersed in a rich and vibrant culture filled with excellent schools and historical places of interest.

*** Great investment with long term tenant looking to stay on currently on month to month basis paying $550 p/week***
